title: The should a Thing that can message all teammates in ur  ranked team
body: I think Rito should create  a facebook like messaging system on riot for ranked teams which tell them when they should be online ect even if there offline as u cant message offline people  Plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz rito                  {{champion:157}} {{summoner:6}}

replies.body:
If they did this then they should also do it for friends that are offline in general. Very strange how easy it would have been for them to implement. Hell, it seems like they went out of there way to prevent it.

Anyway, suggestions probably belong in [Player Creations](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations) more so than here.
